name: TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach
address: 292 Vo Nguyen Giap Street, My An Ward, Ngu Hanh Son District, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam
description:
TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach có xe đạp miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục và nhà hàng ở Đà Nẵng. Ngoài dịch vụ phòng, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân chơi trẻ em. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón, câu lạc bộ trẻ em và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Tất cả các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình cáp, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi sen, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có bếp với tủ lạnh và lò vi sóng. Phòng khách có bàn làm việc.

TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet hoặc kiểu lục địa.

Khách có thể sử dụng dịch vụ văn phòng hoặc thư giãn tại quầy bar.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Bãi biển Mỹ Khê chỉ vài bước chân và Bãi biển Bắc Mỹ An 9 phút đi bộ. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach 7 km.

review.rating: Great sea view and a comfortable stay
review.room_type: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: We stayed in a spacious family room with 2 bathrooms. It had an amazing sea view which we could enjoy from the comfort of the balcony. The room was not speckless clean, but it was comfortable for us during our short stay here. The staff were responsive to our requests for room service and reservation for spa. Breakfast buffet spread was good, but the quality was just alright. We enjoyed an hour of Oriental Hair Washing at a discount since we were guests there, the service staff who attended to us were really great and professional. Will consider this hotel if we return to Da Nang for its sea view and great service.
review.comment_negative: There was a musty smell in the bathrooms when we first checked-in, but was gradually gone after a night there. Food quality at the breakfast buffet has some room for improvement (for example the rice rolls were served cold so they tasted quite stale...not a good representation of the delicious Vietnamese food we had in Da Nang). The food overall was also too greasy for my liking.

review.comment_positive:
직원들이 미소를 지으면서 최선을 다해 서비스하겠다는
그 모습에 감동을 받았고 최선을 다하는 직원들께 감사한 마음을 보내드립니다 
가족들과 2일간의 휴가를 보내면서 너무 즐거웠고 좋은 추억을 남기고 떠납니다 
하늘이 도와주셨는지 날씨까지 완벽했던 휴가였습니다
다음에 베트남에 또 휴가를 온다면 TMS호텔에 숙박을 잡아서 숙소 바로 앞에 있는 미케비치해변에서 시간을 더 즐기고 싶네요~
가족들과 좋은 시간 좋은 추억을 만들어 주시는데 도움을 주셨던  TMS호텔에 계신 직원분들께
감사하다는 말씀 올립니다~~ THANK YOU SO MUCH

review.comment_negative:
저희는 총 객실 두개 예약했고 그 중 하나는 패밀리 투베트룸인데 (사진에도 나와있지만) 방 2개가 아니라 방1개에 거실겸 방1개로 침대 하나는 거실에 나와있어요 ㅎ 물론 인지하고 간 사실이긴 하지만 통상 생각하는 투베드룸이 아니라는 거 ㅎㅎ 저희는 가족들끼리 간 거라 상관은 없었지만 참고하셔요^^
해변가에서 밤에 행사하거나 바 같은데서 음악 크게 틀어놓은 날은 밤 10시가 넘어도 시끄러워서 잠자는데 좀 거슬렸네요^^
이 부분은 다낭 해변가 호텔 어딜 가도 비슷할 듯요.

review.rating: Real 5 star experience. We’ll be back.
review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
5 start hotel in best beachfront location. Excellent staff, very professional and ready to assist at every moment. The meals and beverages were first class with a very personable Food & Beverage manager that made our stay particularly special. Our ocean view room was spotless with an uninterrupted ocean view and quiet air conditioning. The massage at the Spa was superb and better than most we’ve experienced anywhere.
Finally the roof top pool. WOW! The best view in Da nang. Great ambiance and again, awesome wait staff!

review.comment_positive: I don’t give top marks very often but this place was great. The area was excellent with the beach on one side and the little streets of Au Duong at the back. The room was huge and had no noise from neighboring rooms at all. Staff were, as is always the case in Vietnam, excellent. We were on the 22nd floor and did get a bit of street noise but didn’t bother us too much at all and I’m very sensitive to noise. Lower floors might get a bit more. Breakfast wasn’t included in our booking but it looked good. We just went to a little French bakery for a croissant (excellent) and coffee. Suited us to have a break from the big breakfasts we’ve been having.

review.comment_positive:
Breakfest was very delicious with a very good selection. The rooms were very large and spacious and the bed were very clean and comfortable. the Bathroom was very clean . The shower was very large and water pressure was great.
The location is amazing. Beachfront location with a rooftop infinity pool.
review.comment_negative: The customer service from some of the staff was amazing from some staff members and in some case very lacking. I would want the brought to the attention of the hotel manager. I can cite a specific issue. I contact the front desk about the electric golf carts that take guests on sightseeing tours and we were told that we do not need to book in advance because the carts will come within 5 minutes as soon as we request one. So we said we would be down right away to request a sightseeing tour.  We proceeded to go downstairs within 5 minutes of the phone call to the front desk in order to request the sightseeing tour but  than we were told that the electric carts were on a break for 1 hour. Additionally we asked who we spoke with at the front desk to find out why we were told incomplete information and no one was able to say who we spoke with. I think that the Concierge/ front desk staff could use some training when it comes to local tours and attractions. and if they do not know any information they should be able to put us on hold to research for us.

review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The guest relationship officers were excellent. Our room was facing the beach. There's an open-air nightclub/disco about 150 meters down the road. They were blasting their music late into the night which disturbed our sleep. The next morning, the GRO asked us whether we had a good sleep. My wife casually mentioned it's noisy and couldn't sleep. The GRO immediately took action and offered to change our room to a higher floor which we happily accepted. We had a good sleep after that. Next morning another GRO came looking for us while we were having breakfast. It was a pleasant surprise. She asked how was our sleep after we changed room. We told her we had a good sleep. The same thing happened when we checked out. Another GRO asked us the same question and hoped we had a good stay. We happily said yes. We're super happy with the excellent services of your GROs. They made us feel at home. Keep up the good services.

review.comment_positive:
- Outstanding attention to the customer experience. 
- Rooms are huge and the view is incredible (premier double room with partial seaview). 
- Gym has all you need (weights, trademils, yoga mats etc.). 
- The pool view is as good as in the pictures. 
- There is a fancier restaurante on the roof top with good food and an incredible view.
- You literally cross the street and you are on the beach.  Behind the hotel there are a few nice streets and a food market with unbelieavably good and cheap seafood/lobsters etc. Scooter rental is 100m from the hotel. 

What a fantastic experience!
review.comment_negative: Could be ideal to have a better organized way to allow people to enjoy the pool (I think there are only 10 pool beds or so available). Perhaps the hotel can set a time limit (like 1h) so more people can enjoy the view and the experience. Not a big deal as I did manage to seat there and and enjoy, just more like a suggestion

review.rating: Fantastic hotel, fabulous staff and a rooftop pool view to die for
review.room_type: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
review.comment_positive: We had a partial sea view room which was great, you could see the beach and sea so it was great. The room was very large and the air con was excellent, very comfortable bed, we slept really well, Wi-Fi was good no issues at all, the shower was amazing didn’t want to get out. Huy Hoang was absolutely brilliant, his English was brilliant and he was really funny, he made our stay great. Thank you (Tom) which is what he called himself, the hotel could do with at least another 5 of him. Breakfast was ok, plenty of it but a bit of a bun fight in the mornings. Rooftop pool was amazing, fabulous views up and down the full length of beaches and happy hour with the cocktails and food was delightful. Fantastic hotel. Would definitely stay again and would highly recommend.
review.comment_negative: A little noisy from the street at night as there are obviously beach parties and a lot of partying Koreans until early hours, this didn’t affect us much as we were always tired enough to sleep after full days exploring so not much of an issue for us, but if you don’t like the noise I’d suggest earplugs. That said it’s not massively loud.

review.comment_positive:
The cleanliness of this hotel was exceptional. The breakfast could have catered a little more for westerner likes. More cheese, etc. Poached eggs were difficult to explain to chef. The room was so clean, spacious, ocean facing was stunning. Management was great. There was music playing on the beach till early morning and they sorted it out.
Fabulous experience and highly recommended. Bicycles on offer. Lovely  surprise of offering 5 pieces of laundry daily on the house. Rooftop bar had wonderful sunsets. They need to order tonic water for gins. Also make sure there are adequate towels at all times on the rooftop. Minor complaints for improvement to perfection.. This Hotel was close to perfect with friendly staff, excellent facilities, cleanliness, great proximity....Thank you

review.rating: Angenehmer Aufenthalt im TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach: Modern und Zentral
review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Das TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach ist wirklich toll. Die Lage ist unschlagbar und ermöglicht einen bequemen Zugang zu allen wichtigen Orten. Die Einrichtung ist zeitgemäß, ohne Anzeichen von Abnutzung, was den Aufenthalt besonders angenehm macht.
Insgesamt ist das TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach eine ausgezeichnete Wahl für Reisende, die nach einem modernen und gut gelegenen Hotel suchen. Mit kleinen Anpassungen könnte es noch mehr glänzen, aber insgesamt war unser Aufenthalt super.
review.comment_negative: Die Bar könnte jedoch freundlicher gestaltet werden, um eine einladendere Atmosphäre zu schaffen. Das Rezeptionspersonal könnte von zusätzlicher Schulung profitieren, um den Service weiter zu verbessern. Trotzdem bleibt das Personal stets höflich und hilfsbereit.

review.rating: Incredible 5+ star hotel in a great location, immaculate facilities and the best staff
review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The standard of everything in the hotel but the stand out was the staff. Location is great, opposite the beach. The breakfast was 5/5 with a huge variety of food, varying everyday. The hotel was spotless throughout from room to reception to toilets etc. Of all the hospitality we have experienced, this stands out by a mile. It is a 5+ hotel for an extremely good price. We had a junior ocean suite and had the best view of the ocean. Free laundry service everyday day, free sauna / steam bath at the spa and more. Would recommend  over other bigger brand hotels like the Sheraton / Hilton etc. They also offer tours that are cheaper / same price as other external tour operators and tell you when a tour may not be needed but recommend a taxi / driver / entrance fees instead.

review.comment_positive:
모기에 엄청 물렸었는데, 직원분이 약도 주시고 방청소 추가로 해준다고 하셨고, 모기약도 뿌려준다고 하셨어요^^1박남은 날이라 방도 옮겨주신다고 하셨지만 괜찮다고 제가 사양했습니다. 수영장이 뷰가 멋졌는데 너무 바람많이 부는 날에 가서ㅜㅠ 추웠어요ㅜㅠ
오션프론트 정말 뷰가 환상입니다^^
바다바로 앞이라 위치도 좋았구요~
그리고 마지막날 11월2일 아침번 여자직원이셨는데
저희가 다낭공항을 국내선으로 잘못 그랩잡아서 4만동 가까이 현금이 부족한 상황에서 비행기시간은 다되고ㅜㅠ우왕좌왕하고 있으니 
(카드등록을 못한데다 베트남돈 다쓰고 온다고 호텔 비용지불하면서 다썼거든요ㅜㅜㅡ)
그냥 돈을 주시며 가라고 하셨어요ㅜㅠ
제가 카드결제하겠다고 했더니 괜찮다고 정말 괜찮으니가시라고 웃으며 응대해주셨어요ㅜㅠ
진심으로 감사드립니다~

review.comment_positive:
오션뷰 최고에요. 돈 더 내고 오션뷰 방 선택할 만한 값어치 있어요. 하루 종일 바다만 보고 있어도 힐링 될 정도로 뷰가 짱이에요 진짜!!

밤마다 해변가에서 파티해서 시끄럽다는 후기를 읽고 갔는데, 생각보다 그렇게 시끄럽지 않았고 잠귀 밝은 편인데도 시끄러워서 깨진 않았어요. 대신 복도랑 방음이 잘 안돼서 밖에서 떠드는거 잘 들려요. 특히 쥥귁인

직원들 모두 너무너무너무 친절해요. 룸 청소 안 한 날에는 오늘은 클리닝 서비스 필요 없는지도 확인전화해주시네요.

조식은 매일 메뉴가 조금씩 바뀌는데 늦게 가면 맛있는 거 못 먹어요.

인피니티풀이 사진으로 보는 것보다 작아서 좀 놀랐지만, 선베드랑 타월 공짜로 제공돼서 좋아요. 근데 걸터 앉아서 사진 못 찍어요 못 앉게 합니다.

review.rating: Overall, an excellent hotel and we would definitely consider TMS hotel Da Nang again.
review.room_type: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Our oceanview room on the 23rd floor was modern, spacious, clean and had a fantastic view of the Da Nang beach coastline. Nice rooftop bar and pool. Location was excellent, just across the street from the very nice Bac My An beach. This was one of the nicest, cleanest public access beaches that I have visited compared Phuket, Hua Hin, Bali and Sentosa. There were also bars and restaurants within walking distance and attractions such as Dragon Bridge and Marble Mountains were just about 15mins by a short taxi/Grab ride. Also, liked that this areas is slightly quieter than the beach area further up north where the restaurants and hotels are more densely packed.
review.comment_negative: Location near beach bars meant that we could hear the music from our room, but these were promptly turned off at 11pm each night and didn't disturb our sleep. Breakfast selection was average; during breakfast peak hours, it could get a bit crowded due to tour groups but it remained a pleasant dining experience.

Sa situation géographique nous permet d'être entre Hoi An et Hue, ainsi que de nombreux petits restaurants aux alentours. Pas besoin de ramener de serviette pour la piscine c'est l'établissement qui les fournies.

TMS Da Nang is a wonderful hotel, we liked it so much we extended our stay there by a week. The rooms are spacious, quiet and modern and the staff couldn’t be more helpful. It’s conveniently located right in front of the beach and within walkable distance to lots of great restaurants. 

I also have to give a special mention to the spa team who provide excellent services - I especially recommend the herbal massage.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is very well located in front of the beach with nice sea and city views.
The room was very big, clean and comfortable.
The pool is really pretty with a great view and good service for beverage and food.
staff welcome me very nice at check in and say goodbye at check out.
review.comment_negative:
It was too crowded as there was holidays and for breakfast after they sit me only the table look clean but floor (with food remaining of previous costumers) was not clean, also in the egg station omelette were pre- prepared and food was cold.
Another incident was in the massage I took a head massage that ended up in a face mask treatment, not the best

review.room_type: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 5 nights during raining season and had an ample room with ocean view. Da Nang’s bay is quite beautiful. So many  interesting sites to visit in the area: Hoi An, Huè… We enjoyed our time very much, even if the weather was not helping.
The staff was friendly and very helpful in making special arrangements. Outstanding facilities (albeit we were not able to use the pool) and great spa services.
The breakfast buffet was very good, they served delicious steak every morning!, and changed the offer daily.
review.comment_negative:
I would recommend avoiding rainy season for this visit.  
The breakfast buffet at times was a bit too busy and noisy. 
We did not understand why they had fake drawers in our bedside tables.  They could have been useful to keep the room organized. ;)

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
2번째 방문이었는데 3년전 대비 살짝 연식은 느껴졌으나 그래도 여전히 깔끔하고 관리가 잘되고 있어서 만족했습니다.
직원분들도 다 친절하시고 조식도 상당히 훌륭한 편입니다. 주변에 맛집이 많고 위치가 매우 좋으며 객실 발코니나 루프탑에서 바라보는 바닷가 전망은 최고입니다. 루프탑 레스토랑도 가격도 괜찮고 음식 깔끔해서 추천..
review.comment_negative:
체크인이 몰리는 시점에는 리셉션이 바쁘고 경황이 없어서 대기가 좀 있을수 있으며
가장 큰 문제점은 호텔 자체의 문제는 아니나 앞쪽 해변가 클럽에서 늦은 밤까지 음악, 노래 소리가 크게 들려서 소음에 예민하신 분은 추천하지 않습니다. 그것만 빼고는 매우 만족스러운 호텔입니다.

review.rating: Good all-round hotel, but would consider a slightly different area next visit.
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Breakfast had a good selection, freshly cooked breads, an egg and pho station with other delights available.

We took a family room, it was very spacious and had most of the amenities we needed. View of the beach is decent and appreciated the fresh fruit on the first night.
review.comment_negative:
To improve the breakfast: the coffee needed to have been drip/filter rather than mixing up instant granules. 

To improve the room layout, the wardrobe needed to have been placed in the rooms rather than the entrance way. We had one surprise, a giant cockroach appear the 2nd night, it jumped from the curtain to the bed where we finally bound it up in a tissue. 

We are in the 25F restaurant twice. The food was good, service was too, apart from the last night we waited a very long time for the banana sago and then even longer to get the bill. We had young children who had to be taken outside… then the room before we could settle up.

review.rating: Schönes Hotel am Stadtstrand. Leider mit einigen Kratzern.
review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Sehr schönes Zimmer, toller Blick vom 22. Stock auf das Meer. Freundliiches Personal. Angenehmes Restaurant am Rooftop mit Blick auf die Stadt. Speisen sehr gut, nervige Musikbeschallung wurde auf meine Bitte sofort reduziert. 
Beim Frühstück gab es Espresso aus der Maschine und nicht wie sonst üblich aus dem Automaten.
review.comment_negative:
Es sind viele Kleinigkeiten, die sich in der Summe doch nervig gestalten, in dieser Kategorie und Preislage (knapp über 100 Euro pro Nacht), eine Auswahl:

Laundry sehr teuer 

Frühstück: wer gerne Video-Telefonate und Gäste im Gym-Outfit neben sich hat, der hat keine Probleme. Enormes Angebot  - für asiatische Gäste, das westliche Angebot ist sehr überschaubar. Weitere Eindrücke empfehle ich der Phantasie...

Postkarten konnten nicht entgegen genommen. Mir wurde jedoch die Adresse vom Post Office notiert, für den Taxifahrer...

Sehr unbequeme Balkonmöbel. Kein Stauraum im Schrank (3 Kleiderbügel)...

Zimmer wurde erst am Nachmittag gemacht. 

Handwerkerarbeiten (Bohren, Hämmern) im Nachbarzimmer vor 8 Uhr. 

Wollte an der Rezeption einen Geldschein über ca. 8 Euro für Trinkgelder (Zimmer, Bellboy...) wechseln lassen. Nicht möglich. 

Nochmal: alles Kleinigkeiten, nur bei dieser Roomrate/Kategorie darf das eigentlich nicht vorkommen.

review.comment_negative:
바닷가에서 밤12시까지 가수 공연? 등이 있습니다. 
부모님모시고간 여행이라 일찍 자야하는데 문 닫아도 꽤 잘 들려요. (12층)
그래서 고층으로 요청하라는 후기 보고, 저도 고층으로 요청했는데요.
방이 없다며 처음에 5층?을 주더라고요.
3박 예약이라 그럼 하루 자고 내일은 고층으로 바꿔달라 요구했더니 
내일도 방이 없다. ??? 체크아웃하는 사람이 아무도 없다고? 정말? 진심이지?? (살짝 표정 썩음)
그랬더니 잠시만 기다려달라며 한참을 뭘 어쩌고 저쩌고 하더니
12층으로 주더군요. 원래 다른 사람 방인데 주는거라며
?? 층수도 미리 지정해서 예약이 가능한거였나?? 아직 체크인이 안된방이니 날 준걸텐데
다른사람 방이라는게 무슨말이지?? ???? 
물음표가 엄청 남았지만 부모님도 기다리고 계시고 더 얼굴 붉히기 싫어 고맙다하고  체크인했습니다.
혹시라도 고층 요청했는데 낮은층 받으신분들은 좀더 강하게 요청하세요. 
12층이었지만 음악소리 차 소리 은근 다 들립니다. 
저층이었으면 더 시끄러웠겠죠.

review.rating: I Loved every minute of my stay
review.room_type: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
I loved this place - will come back here! I booked 20 nights in the TMS hotel and I loved everyone of them.

It starts with a very warm welcome where you're greeted with a friendly smile, a refreshing cocktail and a Hawaiian like flower necklace. When they asked me if they could take my photo I was a bit hesitant, but when they gave me the printed photo in a lovely welcome frame I was sold.

My room was as hoped. Large, huge bed, huge bathroom with super nice walk-in shower with a big rain shower-head. I had booked a room with city view and that's what I got. I stayed at the 23rd floor and the views were fantastic, I had a nice balcony with seating options and it was simply perfect. What I also loved is the AC which was very sensitive, but in a good way. You could really fine tune the room temp by changing it only 1'C degree up or down.

My room was also very quiet and when the sliding door the balcony is closed you shut out 99% of the outside noises.

I didn't spend much time on the rooftop even though it is a lovely terrace with a good restaurant (I ate here once). The rooftop infinity pool is very relaxed, but it only offers a few beach beds so if you want to spend some time there you have to be early. I couldn't care less as right in front of the hotel there's a long-stretched white sandy beach where you can enjoy the sun and sea in a perfect way. For only EUR 1,35 you can rent a bed for the day and get some refreshments too. The beach wasn't crowded when I stayed there and there's a lot of space if you want to have some more space. But again, this beach is plenty big and you will never feel crowded.

What else? Well to my opinion the most important was the genuine feel of the hospitality in TMS hotel. Each and every team member was fantastic and incredibly service oriented and friendly. A big shout out and THANK YOU to Thanh Thào working in the small coffee corner in the lobby.

review.rating: Incredibly hospitable staff and super location on the beachfront
review.room_type: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The staff at TMS were fantastic. From our arrival to departure their hospitality was a highlight. 
We wanted to stay on the beachfront and the location didn’t disappoint, we could cross the road and step onto the beach. In addition, there were lovely eateries and cafes within walking distance in the quaint streets behind the hotel. 
Our rooms were lovely with a spectacular view. 
Unfortunately as it was chilly and drizzling we didn’t make use of the swimming pool, but in the right weather conditions it would be an amazing place to cool off and enjoy the views of the Da Nang beachfront. 
We only stayed for 1 night, but wish we could have stayed longer.

review.comment_positive: Our stay at TMS Da Nang was incredible. Firstly, the staff were the kindest, most helpful, welcoming hotel staff I have ever experienced! Five stars also from room view, cleanliness, breakfast, facilities & location (on the beach). Only thing to note is that it is a 10 minute drive away from the city centre - but the ocean view is worth it! If you are sensitive to noise, I will say that we had a the suite with the ocean view, and you can hear people on the beach all night, but this was not an issue for us. Thank you, TMS Da Nang - you truly made our trip to Da Nang so, so memorable!

review.room_type: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
review.comment_positive:
We had such a great time here!! The hotel is splendid but what makes it a really great hotel is the staff. 
They are helpful, kind, hospitable,...I cannot highlight them enough!
The restaurant is top-notch (price/quality is very, very good) and the restaurant staff is super professional and so kind. Chef Hung is a really good cook. (There wasn't a single dish we did not enjoy. Bur for me the ribs were chef's kiss. The meat fell of the bone.)
I also did a few treatments at the wellness which were wonderful. Trang Anh and her colleagues are excellent masseuses and the welcome you get is so kind and relaxing. 
The staff at the front desk (shout out to duty manager Jason who was super friendly and very funny), as well as all the other people working at the hotel, deserve praise. Not a single one did not greet you or was unkind. And whatever question you have, they are always there to help you with a smile.
The rooms are spacious and very clean. Big thumbs up for the cleaning crew!
We absolutely loved it here. Cannot recommend this hotel enough.

review.rating: Wonderful stay. I would book this hotel again.

Breakfast is good with a variety of western spread like omelet station, bread, sweets, cereal, yogurt etc and asian spread like porridge, soup, noodles, stir fried meat etc. The view from the pool was great too. Gym is decent (threadmill, weights etc). Service throughout the hotel was impeccable (reception, bell buy, pool resto and buffet resto). Love the location of the hotel as its just right infront of the beach and also within walking distance to many nice restos. Highly recommended!

review.comment_positive: Very good location. amazing views from the room. As we took the Family connecting rooms (we actually got a gorgeous view of BOTH the city and the Ocean). The bright airy feeling of the rooms was a plus and watching the sunrise and the gorgeous moon from the balcony was a major highlight of our stay. Right across (2 min walk or less) from the beach. Being one of the tallest hotels along that stretch also meant that the sea right in front of the hotel was suitably sheltered (if the sun was too hot). The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The Night View from the bar at the top - the city lights is also amazing. This was an excellent accomodation - and a lovely welcome to Danang for us :)

review.comment_negative: Not happy with stay, I don’t ever write reviews but felt I needed to this time. I paid for 2 rooms, clearly stated on my booking that it was for 3 adults and 1 child (9years old) upon arrival they told me I had to pay extra for the bed and that the booking was free for 6 and under even though the booking clearly shows 9 years old. Reiterated this to them and they still made excuses saying i will still have to pay even though the room was already paid for. The room showed clearly 3 adults, 1 child (9 years old) I shouldn’t have paid extra for a bed that I have already paid for. They said the room was only for 3 adults when clearly it wasn’t. Massive rip off because they think they can charge you any price they want. Definitely not staying here. Absolute hell, cockroaches in the room also.

review.room_type: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
review.comment_positive:
Perfekte Lage: über die Straße der lange Sandstrand, auf der Rückseite des Hotels ein Viertel mit hübschen kleinen Straßen und vielen netten Cafés und Restaurants.
Unser Zimmer mit seitlichem Meerblick im 24. Stock geräumig und angenehm auch für unseren längeren Aufenthalt. Letzte Etage darüber der Pool und das gute Bar-Restaurant mit tollem Blick auf Strand und Stadt. Ausgezeichnetes Frühstücksbuffet mit einer breiten und wechselnden Auswahl sowie Stationen für Eiergerichte und asiatische Frühstücksstandards. Dazu die Top-Mannschaft, die auch bei morgendlichem Andrang den Überblick behielt, nach 2 Tagen unsere Tisch- und Getränkevorlieben draufhatte und uns zudem mit guten Besichtigungstipps versorgte. Das Personal war generell ausgesprochen freundlich und hoch motiviert. Die Rezeption hat uns sehr geholfen, eine von einer ATM eingezogene Kreditkarte schnell von der betreffenden Bank zurückzuerhalten. Wir können das Hotel nur empfehlen und würden hier gerne wieder buchen.
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel hat keinen eigenen Beach Club. Am Besten eigene Strandtücher dabeihaben.

review.comment_positive:
From the check-in, till last minute we stayed there, which was 23 days I think 🤔, we liked everything, the reception made us feel everyday very welcome ,including the guys at entrance ,who gave us the beach towels,the staff at the restaurant , from the Chef and all the waiters, were  polite ,very caring, clean,and amazing food ( I worked 30 years in this business ) we ate there many times and the food was every time exceptional, already miss the (Pho noodles ,and bahn xeo,the sea food soup too ,the vegetables spring rolls,..really the whole menu..
The Spa staff, very professional,  we had massages and Sauna to the hotel and some other places too, we like the most at the hotel and one another place, to the hotel the whole package  from the Sauna ,the massage rooms, the staff ,the massage beds, very clean and always smelling perfect, thousand percent recommend that place 😀 
Over all the best 5 star I've stayed so far, in the top of all ,just can't stay without mention her, the most charming and professional executive assistant manager, -miss Phuong ,-thank you for making us feel ( me and my cousin)very welcome everyday ,asking us every time if we needed anything, just to make sure we've got everything to make our holiday unforgettable in that place 😊
Till next time TMS ,see you soon...

review.room_type: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
review.comment_positive: I stayed here for one night so my review is based on a very short stay. The staff are amazing, they can't do enough for you and made me feel so welcome. My room was huge with such a comfy bed. Its right in front of the beach so perfect location for  what I needed (a chilled couple of days at the beach). The pool and bar on the roof is incredible, with views of the sea and city. The breakfast is lovely with a big selection of options.
review.comment_negative:
There's only a dozen sun loungers by the rooftop pool as it isn't a big space but the beach is just in front so not too much of an issue. 

The music from the beach bar in front of the hotel was quite loud in to the night but that was one night so I don't know if thats something that is a regular occurance.

review.room_type: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
review.comment_positive: Had a great stay at this property and will definitely stay here again. Hotel is just across the beach.  The room was spacious, modern and everything looks new and nice and Korean.  Shower room was phenomenal and spacious with the large view window. I was assigned the upper floor with a balcony that has partial view of the beach. Many thanks for the ashtray on the balcony. Room has minibar. Also has nice and comfortable seating areas and a work area. Wi-fi is fast and stable.  Rooftop restaurant has amazing views of the city. Infinity pool has views of the beach.  Check-in was a breeze. Staff greeted me with a flower lie...sweet. Staff were amazingly friendly and helpful. The room service was excellent. Truly Korean hospitably at it's beast. Not a big fan of the Korean menu and I mostly eat outside as great restaurants are nearby. Other shops like convenience store, laundry and pharmacies nearby.

review.rating: Really, lovely hotel and great location on the beach
review.room_type: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Overall the hotel was fantastic with lovely, airy, clean rooms with amazing balconies overlooking the beach and sea. The rooftop pool is just stunning and the top floor restaurant also has great food with amazing views over the city, particularly at night. The staff were great and very helpful in helping us organise trips to Hue and SunWorld for our daughter's birthday (highly recommend for a fun afternoon/evening)

Breakfast is great in the hotel, but there are plenty of other options nearby too if you want to get out and about. Our girls loved Crazy Cow ice cream and we also visited the Dragon Bridge on the Saturday night. Be prepared though as it was very busy on all the surrounding streets, so if you don't like crowds, you'll have to see the fire-breathing from a distance !!
review.comment_negative:
This is isn't a criticism of the hotel, but be aware there is a lot of development going on in Da Nang and lots of construction site. On one of the days there was a lot of drilling and banging coming from a nearby site and there is a stage on the beach directly below the hotel that plays loud music most night until 11pm. 

Also be prepared for noise form the street outside (tooting of horns, etc) and also the fact the beach is packed at 5.30am with people watching the sunrise. None of these things can be controlled by the hotel though and they didn't detract from our stay. In short, if you want peace and quiet Da Nang is probably not the place for you....

review.comment_positive:
더 할 말이 없습니다. 가격대비 다낭 최고입니다. 
직원들은 매우 친절하며, 영어는 기본입니다. 호텔로비에서 바다까지 5초걸립니다. 방이 매우 넓습니다.  돈 조금더 보태서 해변뷰 방 잡으세요, 아니면 후회합니다. 그리고 바로앞에 서핑보드 빌려주는곳 있는데 생각보다 파도 좋습니다. 사람도 없고.

***매주 토요일 저녁, 루프탑에서 바베큐 파티를 엽니다. 저도 우연히 일정이 겹쳐서 신청해봤는데 (추가금액있음), 조식 뷔페와는 비교도 안되는 식사가 제공됩니다. 무조건, 무조건 가보시는거 추천합니다. 솔직히 다낭자체는 하노이나 호치민에 비해 할게 없어서 실망스러웠는데 이 바베큐파티 하나로 다 위로받았습니다.
review.comment_negative:
호텔자체의 세탁서비스는 정말 엄청나게 비쌉니다. 근처에 호텔 세탁 픽업, 드랍까지 다되는 외부업체 있는데 거기다 맡기세요. / 시내와 멉니다. 걸어서 용다리 까지 30분 또는 그 이상 정도 걸립니다. / 테라스에 재떨이 있는데 금연이에요 피우면 돈내요.

***가끔 시끄럽다는 후기가 있는데 호텔 위치 자체가 어쩔수가 없습니다. 해변가 공연장 바로 앞에 위치해 있으며 호텔기준 조금만 오른쪽으로 가면 해변클럽과 공사중인 옆건물이, 바로 왼편에는 규모가 좀 있는 펍이 있습니다. 하지만 그만큼 문화적으로 활발한 위치에 있다고 보시면 되요, 저희는 맨날 앞에서 공연보다보니 공연하는 밴드랑 친해져서 옆 펍에서 술한잔 했습니다ㅋㅋ 밤귀가 예민하신 분들은 힘들수도 있지만 솔직히 그렇게까지 신경쓰일정도는 아닙니다. 완전히 해외여행온 분위기라 오히려 좋았습니다.(해운대 같은 느낌 전혀 아닙니다.)
